title: In case of proposed residential buildings and public buildings/facilities having BUA less than 2000sq
clause_text: In case of proposed residential buildings and public buildings/facilities having BUA less than 2000sq. m the access path and walkways up to lift/staircase on ground level/stilt/podium from drop off zone shall be provided for differently abled persons.
